alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Orleans (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:38AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Orleans and northwestern Monroe Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1237 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Albion, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, Brockport, Albion, Hilton, Hamlin Beach State Park, Spencerport, Holley, Waterport, Kent, Clarendon, Gaines, Kendall, Charlotte, Fancher, Morton, Barre Center and Braddock Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
